charges.description: FAILED TO COMPLY WITH AN ORDER .
WHILE ON-DUTY, WAS DISCOURTEOUS TO A NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT SUPERVISOR.
WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY ABSENTED HERSELF FROM POLICE DUTIES
WRONGFULLY FAILED TO REMAIN ALERT AND REMAIN ON POST UNTIL RELIEVED, AS REQUIRED.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (20 day(s) )

charges.description: MADE INACCURATE, INCOMPLETE, OR OTHERWISE MISLEADING STATEMENTS DURING AN OFFICIAL DEPARTMENT INTERVIEW.

charges.description: while on-duty, was late to or left early from her assignment without permission or police necessity.

charges.description: while on-duty, wrongfully made inaccurate entries in Department records.
charges.penalty: DEDUCTION OF PENSIONABLE TIME, FORFEITURE OF TIME/LEAVE BALANCES, RESTITUTION ($50), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: while on-duty, wrongfully made or caused inaccurate entries in a Sign-In/Sign-Out Log or Activity Log.
